title: Asahi Senpai's Favorite
alternative_title: Asahi-senpai no Okiniiri, Asahi Senpai’s Favorite
status: Asahi-senpai no Okiniiri, Asahi Senpai’s Favorite
description:
Description :
        Matsuri had lived her days peacefully, until one day she met her big brother's friend, Asahi Ryunosuke in a completely unexpected way. After a series of awkward events, they become closer. Now her days passed with the super popular "Asahi-senpai" teasing her to no end.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1.1: We Got Too Close, What Am I Supposed To Do?
